member.name: ITransferAdviseSink.ConfirmEncryptionLoss
member.summary: Displays a message to the user confirming that loss of encryption is acceptable for this operation.
member.param: A pointer to an of the file in which encryption information will be lost.

returns.para: Returns one of the following specific Shell codes, or a system error code.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
User responded "Yes" to the dialog. Copy continues without encryption.
User responded "No" to the dialog.
Error has been queued and will display later. Operation on this file will be skipped.

member.name: ITransferAdviseSink.ConfirmOverwrite
member.summary: Displays a message to the user confirming that overwriting existing items is acceptable.
member.param: A pointer to the source .
A pointer to the destination parent folder .
A pointer to a wide-string containing the desired name of the item at the destination. If NULL, the name is the same as the Shell item pointed to by psiSource.

returns.para: The return values listed below are emitted specifically by this method to inform the calling process of how the operation ended. If other results or errors are emitted during the operation of this method, they should be returned to the calling process.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The user clicked Ignore. Allows the calling process to continue processing other files as appropriate.
The user clicked Cancel. Stops processing of the current document and ends the current process.

member.name: ITransferAdviseSink.FileFailure
member.summary: Called when there is a failure and user interaction is needed.
member.param: The on which the operation failed.
Optional. A pointer to a null-terminated buffer that contains the name of the file. If this value is NULL, the name given by the psi parameter is used.
The error code generated by the failure. This error must be handled by the copy engine.

Optional. When this method returns, contains a pointer to a null-terminated buffer that contains a new name for the file. The name cannot exceed length cchRename. If this parameter is NULL, no option to rename will be available.
The size of the pszRename buffer, in characters.

returns.para: Any other HRESULT should be returned to the calling process. If the failure is not handled, the return value should be hrError.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The user clicked Retry. The handler should retry the file operation.
The user clicked Cancel. The entire copy job is being terminated. The handler should return this code back to the copy engine.
The user clicked Ignore. The handler should skip creating the item and return this code back to the copy engine.

member.name: ITransferAdviseSink.PropertyFailure
member.summary: Called when there is a failure that involves file properties and user interaction is needed.
member.param: A pointer to the that caused the failure.
A value that corresponds to the property that will be lost. A NULL value indicates that all properties were lost.
The error code generated by the failure. It must be handled by the copy engine.

returns.para: Any other HRESULT should be passed up. If the failure is not handled, the return value should be hrError.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The handler should retry the file operation.
The handler should retry the file operation using the name returned in the pszRename buffer.
The user has indicated that the handler should overwrite the existing file.
The user has indicated that the handler should try the operation again without the security descriptor.
The user clicked Cancel. The entire copy job is being terminated. The handler should return this code back to the copy engine.

member.summary: Called when there is a failure that involves secondary streams and user interaction is needed.
member.param: A pointer to the that caused the failure.
The name of the data that will be lost in the operation.
The error code that was generated. It must be handled by the copy engine.

returns.para: Any other HRESULT should be passed up. If the failure is not handled, the return value should be hrError.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The handler should retry the file operation.
The handler should retry the file operation using the name returned in the pszRename buffer.
The user has indicated that the handler should overwrite the existing file.
The user has indicated that the handler should try the operation again without the security descriptor.
The user clicked Cancel. The entire copy job is being terminated. The handler should return this code back to the copy engine.

The total number of bytes in the current operation.

member.name: ITransferAdviseSink.UpdateTransferState

param.name: ts
param.para: The transfer state. One of the following values.
0x00000002. The transfer is preparing to begin. For example, this flag would be set when space requirements are being calculated.
0x00000004. Length of the transfer is unknown.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
